events.message: I recently received my order, but I want to return the product and get a refund because it doesn't meet my expectations.
The customer issue has been categorized under 'Refund' based on the keywords and message content provided.
Assigning the refund case to agent Sarah M. for further assistance and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your return and refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know the reason why you want a refund?
The order number is 123456789. The product did not match the description on the website, so I am not satisfied.
We can start the refund process immediately. Please send the product back using the prepaid shipping label we will provide.
Thank you for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label offer and will send the product back today.
We have received your returned product and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited in 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure your refund was received and that you are satisfied with how we handled your request.
Closing the case as the refund was successfully issued and confirmed by the customer with no further issues.
